Text:
hey 2040 thanks a lot for this ....i wanted whether u have stop uploading in SU completely ...or till the time they fix everything up ???  
once again thanks a lot for this :)
Thanks 20/40!! Could you upload the TV show Not Going Out all of the seasons? Thanks in advanced, glad to see you back again and keep up the great work :-)

@wish123: I honestly have no idea. It depends on many factors. Currently I am here, even if this place allowed bullying me out year ago.

@HDrocks: I love that comedy series from day one, but - HiDef sources are not available for older seasons (HD airings are relatively new stuff) and I need that  as the source. Season Four I have lost in two HDD crashes last year.
@HDrocks: On SU I would upload seasons 1 to 3 as DVDrips and fourth as HDTV.
